content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Iron Plate Production Line
Consists of two furnaces that smelt iron ore into iron plates:
- Furnace at position(0.0, 0.0) with coal fuel and iron ore input
- Furnace at position(2.0, 0.0) with coal fuel and iron ore input

###Copper Plate Production Line  
Consists of two furnaces that smelt copper ore into copper plates:
- Furnace at position(4.0, 4.0) with coal fuel
- Furnace at position(6.0, 4.0) with coal fuel

###Power Generation System
Steam-based power generation setup consisting of:
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) extracting water
- Boiler at position(-2.5, 24.0) heating water into steam
- Steam engine at position(4.5, 24.5) generating electricity
- Two pipe groups:
  - Water pipes connecting offshore pump to boiler (fluid system 4257)
  - Steam pipes connecting boiler to steam engine (fluid system 4258)
- Electric pole network connecting power to facilities (poles at x=8.5 at y positions 2.5, 6.5, 10.5, 14.5, 18.5 and pole at 6.5, 24.5)

###Research Facility
Lab conducting electronics research using automation science packs

ERROR TIPS

### Resource insertion errors
- Check inventory has required resources before attempting to insert into machines
- Maintain adequate supply of raw materials (copper ore, iron ore, coal) to keep production running

### Power system maintenance
- Monitor coal levels in boiler and add fuel before it runs out
- Keep coal reserves available for power generation and furnace operation
